Original: Oh, that request? It is the usual
journey to search for Raht.
[Page]
I am sure you will have no trouble
finding him this time either.
[Page]
I was surprised to see that the client
this time is his fiancee... She is the
beauty sitting over there.
[Page]
I wonder how Raht met her... Be sure
to listen to her carefully. I shall
await your swift return.
Translation: Oh, that request? It is the usual
journey to search for Raht.
[Page]
I am sure you will have no trouble
finding him this time either.
[Page]
I was surprised to see that the client
this time is his fiancee... She is the
beauty sitting over there.
[Page]
I wonder how Raht met her... Be sure
to listen to her carefully. I shall
await your swift return.

Original: Welcome back. I did not think this
day would come... Is he really not
coming back?
[Page]
I thought he had the devil's own luck,
but he met his end all too soon...
[Page]
Do not blame yourselves. There is
always this danger when one goes
exploring. I am sure he knew that.
[Page]
And you have fulfilled the request,
so you are entitled to the reward.
You should be proud to collect it.
Translation: Welcome back. I did not think this
day would come... Is he really not
coming back?
[Page]
I thought he had the devil's own luck,
but he met his end all too soon...
[Page]
Do not blame yourselves. There is
always this danger when one goes
exploring. I am sure he knew that.
[Page]
And you have fulfilled the request,
so you are entitled to the reward.
You should be proud to collect it.

Original: As you search for the lost explorer,
you see a familiar sight: the wreckage
of Raht's skyship.
Translation: As you search for the lost explorer,
you see a familiar sight: the wreckage
of Raht's skyship.

Original: Though when you disembark and check
the wreckage, you find not Raht, but
merely a parchment in a bottle.
[Page]
"Raht's Adventure Log ＃2:
Raht here. I leave this in the hopes
it finds someone as determined as me.
[Page]
"My wings are broken, but I still
have my legs. So my journey goes on.
Though I can't go quite as far...
[Page]
"[Color:5]I can't fly, so I can't go higher up[Color:0],
and [Color:5]I can't swim, so I can't cross
any water[Color:0]. But that's all right.
[Page]
"I'll just [Color:5]follow[Color:0] the [Color:5]ravine[Color:0] that
stretches [Color:5]east[Color:0].
[Page]
"As long as I can walk, my journey
will continue... Time to move onward!
(Cont'd. in Adventure Log ＃3.)"
[Page]
You are unsure whether to follow the
note's directions to find Raht, or
report this development to the client.
Translation: Though when you disembark and check
the wreckage, you find not Raht, but
merely a parchment in a bottle.
[Page]

Original: As you sail the skies in search of
the explorer Raht, you discover traces
of a campsite.
Translation: As you sail the skies in search of
the explorer Raht, you discover traces
of a campsite.

Original: It seems Raht set up camp here...
What look to be his footsteps
continue to the [Color:5]north[Color:0].
[Page]
If you are to follow him, you will
have to proceed [Color:5]north[Color:0] from here.
Translation: It seems Raht set up camp here...
What look to be his footsteps
continue to the [Color:5]north[Color:0].
[Page]
If you are to follow him, you will
have to proceed [Color:5]north[Color:0] from here.

Original: You follow Raht's trail closely and
search the area from the sky. There
is something on the ground...
Translation: You follow Raht's trail closely and
search the area from the sky. There
is something on the ground...

Original: When you disembark, you find that it
is a parchment in a bottle, most
likely left behind by Raht.
[Page]
"Raht's Adventure Log ＃3:
Raht here. I leave this in the hopes
it finds someone as determined as me.
[Page]
"They said this land was impossible
to navigate on foot, but I'm going to
try. I feel like a real adventurer.
[Page]
"Things are going smooth so far.
I found giant ruins to the south...
Must be that Echoing Library.
[Page]
"But there are monsters roaming around
there. Those are monsters, right?
They look more like stone statues...
[Page]
"Either way, I can't deal with them.
[Color:5]I'll give up on reaching the ruins
and continue exploring this area[Color:0].
[Page]
"As long as I'm alive, my journey
will continue... Onward to adventure!
(Cont'd. in Adventure Log ＃4.)"
[Page]
You are unsure whether to follow the
note's directions to find Raht, or
report this development to the client.
Translation: When you disembark, you find that it
is a parchment in a bottle, most
likely left behind by Raht.
[Page]
"Raht's Adventure Log ＃3:
Raht here. I leave this in the hopes
it finds someone as determined as me.
[Page]

to navigate on foot, but I'm going to
try. I feel like a real adventurer.
[Page]

I found giant ruins to the south...

[Page]

there. Those are monsters, right?
They look more like stone statues...
[Page]
"Either way, I can't deal with them.
[Color:5]I'll give up on reaching the ruins
and continue exploring this area[Color:0].
[Page]
"As long as I'm alive, my journey
will continue... Onward to adventure!
(Cont'd. in Adventure Log ＃4.)"
[Page]
You are unsure whether to follow the
note's directions to find Raht, or
report this development to the client.

Original: As you search for Raht from your
skyship, you spot something shining
on the ground below.
Translation: As you search for Raht from your
skyship, you spot something shining
on the ground below.

Original: When you disembark, you find that it
is a parchment in a bottle, most
likely left behind by Raht.
[Page]
"Raht's Adventure Log ＃4:
I'm leaving this record in the hopes
it finds someone as determined as me.
[Page]
"This all began when I learned I had
an incurable disease and that my days
were numbered.
[Page]
"I couldn't stand the idea of waiting
to die. So I left on a journey to
escape it all... somewhere far away.
[Page]
"Standing here under Yggdrasil at the
ends of the earth, I have what I
wanted. But... I'm not satisfied.
[Page]
"What I want now... is to [Color:5]return to
Tharsis[Color:0]. To see my family and my
lovely fiancee. Just... once more..."
[Page]
The words become unreadable after
this. Whatever clues to the author's
location remain are also gone...
[Page]
You are unsure whether to continue
searching for Raht, or to report this
development to the client.
Translation: When you disembark, you find that it
is a parchment in a bottle, most
likely left behind by Raht.
[Page]
"Raht's Adventure Log ＃4:
I'm leaving this record in the hopes

[Page]

[Page]
The words become unreadable after
this. Whatever clues to the author's
location remain are also gone...
[Page]
You are unsure whether to continue
searching for Raht, or to report this

Original: In order to gain even the faintest of
leads in your search for Raht, you
examine his wrecked skyship again.
Translation: In order to gain even the faintest of
leads in your search for Raht, you
examine his wrecked skyship again.

Original: As you check the wreckage again,
praying to find something, you notice
a hitherto overlooked parchment.
[Page]
"My name is Raht. I was blessed with
a loving family, a devoted fiancee,
and good friends.
[Page]
"But... I was so afraid to die that
I left them all behind...
[Page]
"I should have stayed with them to
the very end. I can't believe I didn't
understand something so obvious...
[Page]
"To whoever reads this, if you happen
to meet my loved ones, will you relay
this message to them?
[Page]
"Tell them thank you for loving me,
and that I'm sorry."
[Page]
The letter ends here... Raht may not
be far off.
Translation: As you check the wreckage again,
praying to find something, you notice
a hitherto overlooked parchment.
[Page]
"My name is Raht. I was blessed with
a loving family, a devoted fiancee,
and good friends.
[Page]
"But... I was so afraid to die that
I left them all behind...
[Page]

[Page]
"To whoever reads this, if you happen

this message to them?
[Page]
"Tell them thank you for loving me,
and that I'm sorry."
[Page]
The letter ends here... Raht may not
be far off.

Original: [Color:5]Search the area?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Search the area?[Color:0]

Original: You spread out and call to Raht,
but there is only silence...
Translation: You spread out and call to Raht,
but there is only silence...

Original: Having exhausted every possible means,
you decide to end your search.
[Page]
You now have a difficult report to
make to your client, who awaits with
a heavy heart.
Translation: Having exhausted every possible means,
you decide to end your search.
[Page]
You now have a difficult report to
make to your client, who awaits with
a heavy heart.

Original: There is no use in prolonging the
inevitable. You must report this
place to your waiting client.
Translation: There is no use in prolonging the
inevitable. You must report this
place to your waiting client.
